DOC.brief_summary: Emergency access granted to treat a single patient with advanced Mucopolysaccharidosis Type 7 with UX003 Recombinant Human Beta-glucuronidase (rhGUS) Enzyme Replacement Therapy via IV administration every other week (QOW) for up to 144 weeks.
DOC.brief_title: An Open-Label Treatment Protocol With UX003 rhGUS Enzyme Replacement Therapy for an Advanced Stage MPS 7 Patient
DOC.criteria: 1 specific patient Confirmed diagnosis of MPS 7 based on leukocyte or fibroblast glucuronidase enzyme assay or genetic testing confirming diagnosis. Written informed consent of parent(s) or legal guardian(s)
